history.proof: intros. intros x y. intros H_star. induction H_star. - apply star_refl. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros X Y T T' incl_T_T'.
intros X' Y T T' incl_T_T'.
intros X' Y' T T' incl_T_T'.
intros X' Y' T'' T' incl_T_T'.
intros X' Y' T'' T''' incl_T_T'.

original: intros X Y T T' incl_T_T'. intros x y. intros H_star. induction H_star. - apply star_refl. - apply star_trans with y. + apply IHstar. + apply incl_T_T'. apply H.
